text: John William Magaw (born 1935) is a former administrator for the United States Federal Government. He began his career in public service in 1959 as a state trooper with the Ohio State Highway Patrol. Magaw became a special agent with the United States Secret Service in 1967. Magaw was appointed senior advisor to the director of the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA) for terrorism preparedness in December 1999. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Columbus, Ohio Category:American police officers Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: John Magaw
